name: Gravity 2 Jump
description:
CONTROLLS:

Space - Jump (In Solo Mode)

W and ArrowUp - Jump  (In Duo mode)

Or click on the buttons ingame to Jump.

GAME:

Try not to fall off platforms for as long as possible.
You can collect different power ups during the game.
As time goes by, the platforms get harder and harder.
With the coins you collect during the game you can buy new things in the shop.
Play alone or locally with a friend.
